Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: It Is Written

The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: Press Your Luck
programme.desc: Three contestants compete against one another in a game of wits and strategy, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board. The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: People Puzzler
programme.desc: Leah Remini hosts the show, which features three contestants who put their pop culture knowledge to the test to complete crosswords from the pop culture magazine. During a player's turn, one word out of 10 is chosen from the board. The contestant is then shown the first unrevealed letter in the word, and a clue is given, with correct answers scoring points based on the word. The player who wins the most points after three rounds moves forward to the fast puzzle bonus round, where they get the opportunity to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. programme.title: Adventures in Missions
programme.desc: Opening Doors in South Bengal: Brent Scully, president of Gospel Outreach, takes you behind the scenes of mission rally preparations. Then join Julie as she visits with Nirobindu and Rita Das, who share the gospel with Hindus in South Bengal.

programme.title: Global Affairs Today
programme.desc: The hosts take an in-depth look at various issues happening around the world and examine them from a Christian perspective.

programme.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
programme.desc: Many people are worried about the last days of this world and that Jesus is coming again.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes’ guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes’ adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E16 Unfinished Business After surviving a brutal massacre of wealthy settlers, Evan, Emma's estranged husband, comes to Sweetwater looking for shelter. When Evan wants to reconcile their relationship, Sam and the riders are suspicious of his intentions.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Texas Fence-Cutting War When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes’ guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes’ adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he’s called to Mississippi to visit Kaley’s parents. Bubba’s in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E3 Tradition vs. Technology A routine job turns tough when the cowboys struggle to wrangle the herd across a highway, sparking Cody’s idea to use GPS devices so they can easily find cattle in the pasture. Bubba hides a cow in the woods and Booger challenges Cody to prove GPS technology beats traditional methods. Misty and Kaley help Jaclyn find the perfect wedding dress while Bubba fails to fit into his tuxedo pants, prompting Booger and Cody to put him on a weight-loss regimen. Cody writes a song in honor of Booger’s wedding and surprises Misty with a trailer for her new cattle business.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Trinity Is Still My Name
programme.desc: Two brothers promise their dying father they'll become the notorious bandits he always wanted them to be. While the older brother intends to teach his younger brother outlaw skills, the two save a pioneer family and break up an arms ring instead.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E3 The Impostor When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E4 Prisoner of Moon Mesa Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E3 The Impostor When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E4 Prisoner of Moon Mesa Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don?t arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher’s herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn’t ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E5 Down and Dirty With nine cowboys remaining, the competition gets fierce. First, an old-fashioned horse race turns into an all-out brawl. Then, a cowboy is rushed to the hospital after a freak accident. Host Trace Adkins and the judges send another cowboy home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E7 Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E22 Then There Was One Teaspoon travels to Texas with an old comrade to warn three aging veterans that someone has been murdering the last men who genuinely remember the Alamo. Jimmy and Buck follow from behind as Teaspoon tracks down the killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E5 Gold, Glory and Custer - Prelude Assigned as a scout, Cheyenne travels with Lt. Colonel George A. Custer and his regiment into Sioux territory while they search for gold. However, events lead up to the famous Little Bighorn disaster.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E6 Gold, Glory and Custer - Requiem A disastrous massacre at Little Bighorn wipes out Colonel Custer's regiment and forces Cheyenne into hiding. But when Major Marcus Reno faces charges of cowardice, Cheyenne re-emerges to testify for him.

programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E5 Gold, Glory and Custer - Prelude Assigned as a scout, Cheyenne travels with Lt. Colonel George A. Custer and his regiment into Sioux territory while they search for gold. However, events lead up to the famous Little Bighorn disaster.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E6 Gold, Glory and Custer - Requiem A disastrous massacre at Little Bighorn wipes out Colonel Custer's regiment and forces Cheyenne into hiding. But when Major Marcus Reno faces charges of cowardice, Cheyenne re-emerges to testify for him.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law’s company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E7 All for One or One for Himself Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley’s father. However, Bubba’s reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naive woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E6 Broken Down After demonstrating their calf-roping skills, the 8 remaining cowboys are challenged to drive a herd of cattle and an old-fashioned chuck wagon across the rugged Arizona terrain. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges send another cowboy packing.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E23 Gathering Clouds Part 1 As tensions rise between the North and the South, the Army recruits the Kid to infiltrate a band of Southern rebel guerrillas led by a man known as the Hawk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E7 Riot at Arroyo Seco Cheyenne faces issues in a small town, including a dry well and anxiety from townspeople, which leads to an uprising. As sheriff, he tries to keep the peace, but the formation of a lynch mob forces him to shoot and kill a prominent citizen's son.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E8 Apache Blood Cheyenne returns a young white man named Mickey, who was kidnapped by the Apaches when he was a child. Problems arise when Mickey's family isn't accepting of his Mexican wife. Mickey rebels against his family, and Cheyenne tries to save his marriage.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law’s company. programme.desc: S4 E7 Riot at Arroyo Seco Cheyenne faces issues in a small town, including a dry well and anxiety from townspeople, which leads to an uprising. As sheriff, he tries to keep the peace, but the formation of a lynch mob forces him to shoot and kill a prominent citizen's son.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E8 Apache Blood Cheyenne returns a young white man named Mickey, who was kidnapped by the Apaches when he was a child. Problems arise when Mickey's family isn't accepting of his Mexican wife. Mickey rebels against his family, and Cheyenne tries to save his marriage.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E8 Happy Trails Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger’s prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E1 My Heart's in Alabama It's time for the cowboys to ride into new pastures as they explore growing their cattle business in unexpected ways. Bubba has been making good money working for his father-in-law’s company in Mississippi, but he realizes he'd rather be out of his office chair and back on his horse in Alabama. Cody is excited to be managing a big rodeo, but a steer mishap puts the future of his contract on the ropes. And, even though Booger has happily saddled up with Jaclyn, it’s unfamiliar terrain for him when she starts adding a woman’s touch to his bachelor pad. As the three cowboys get together to sort yearlings for a friend, they devise a plan for making BBQ sauce to expand their cooking skills and company.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E9 Dead Cold Cash Sara Caruthers, the deceased widow of a bandit Lucas shot when he was a deputy marshal, has an unusal will to get revenge against McCain. It stipulates that $100,000 be divided among North Fork residents if Lucas dies within seven days of her death.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E7 High Stakes and New Leaders Half of the 14 all-star cowboys have been eliminated. The remaining seven contestants must demonstrate skill and grit in a grueling relay race made up of a series of cowboy challenges. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges send another cowboy home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E4 Marie Dorion: Enduring Frontier Legend Marie Dorion, a member of the Iowa People and mother of two, joins her husband on a harrowing expedition to the Pacific Northwest. Though she endures brutal weather, extreme hunger, and the death of her third child, her worst ordeal still lies ahead.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E24 Gathering Clouds Part 2 Jimmy joins the Kid in infiltrating the Hawk's gang. Meanwhile, as the Civil War nears, Sweetwater becomes an embattled town as townspeople must take up arms against the renegades.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E19 A Young Man's Fancy A pretty young girl named Sally Walker arrives on stagecoach in North Fork to visit her aunt Milly. When Mark sees her beauty, he falls in love with Sally instantly. However, she has her eyes on a boy from her past, Bruce Henry, who owns a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E20 The Man from Salinas Lucas is acting deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. When the North Fork Bank is robbed, Lucas shoots and critically wounds Rudy Gray. Problems arise when a man posing as Gray's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E9 Outcast of Cripple Creek After his friend passes away, Cheyenne becomes the marshal of Cripple Creek. Disgusted by all the corruption in the small town, he resigns. His successor arrives but may need Cheyenne's help to keep the peace.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E10 Alibi for the Scalped Man Cheyenne travels to Emmetville for his friend's wedding. When he arrives in town, he finds out that his friend is missing. Suspicious arise around the tight-lipped Emmet family and the bride-to-be who doesn't seemed concerned of his whereabouts.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E8 Happy Trails Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger’s prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.desc: S3 E9 Dead Cold Cash Sara Caruthers, the deceased widow of a bandit Lucas shot when he was a deputy marshal, has an unusal will to get revenge against McCain. It stipulates that $100,000 be divided among North Fork residents if Lucas dies within seven days of her death.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E7 High Stakes and New Leaders Half of the 14 all-star cowboys have been eliminated. The remaining seven contestants must demonstrate skill and grit in a grueling relay race made up of a series of cowboy challenges. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges send another cowboy home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E4 Marie Dorion: Enduring Frontier Legend Marie Dorion, a member of the Iowa People and mother of two, joins her husband on a harrowing expedition to the Pacific Northwest. Though she endures brutal weather, extreme hunger, and the death of her third child, her worst ordeal still lies ahead.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E24 Gathering Clouds Part 2 Jimmy joins the Kid in infiltrating the Hawk's gang. Meanwhile, as the Civil War nears, Sweetwater becomes an embattled town as townspeople must take up arms against the renegades.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E19 A Young Man's Fancy A pretty young girl named Sally Walker arrives on stagecoach in North Fork to visit her aunt Milly. When Mark sees her beauty, he falls in love with Sally instantly. However, she has her eyes on a boy from her past, Bruce Henry, who owns a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E20 The Man from Salinas Lucas is acting deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. When the North Fork Bank is robbed, Lucas shoots and critically wounds Rudy Gray. Problems arise when a man posing as Gray's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E9 Outcast of Cripple Creek After his friend passes away, Cheyenne becomes the marshal of Cripple Creek. Disgusted by all the corruption in the small town, he resigns. His successor arrives but may need Cheyenne's help to keep the peace.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E10 Alibi for the Scalped Man Cheyenne travels to Emmetville for his friend's wedding. When he arrives in town, he finds out that his friend is missing. Suspicious arise around the tight-lipped Emmet family and the bride-to-be who doesn't seemed concerned of his whereabouts.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Boss Spearman (Robert Duvall) and his cowhands Charley (Kevin Costner) and Mose (Abraham Benrubi) are driving cattle across a large expanse of country. When Mose ventures into a sparse village to buy a few necessities, he is met with violent hostility from Denton Baxter (Michael Gambon), an affluent landowner, and his right-hand man, Poole (James Russo). When Mose doesn't come back, Boss and Charley realize he's in trouble, so they plot to get him back and get revenge on those who captured him.

programme.title: Gunsmoke

programme.title: Flaming Star
programme.desc: In this Western set on the Texas frontier, Pacer Burton (Elvis Presley) is the mixed-race son of a white rancher (John McIntire) and his second wife, Kiowa woman Neddy (Dolores del Río). When some local racists cause Neddy's death by preventing the doctor from coming to her aid, a war between the whites and the tribe erupts. As the war threatens to drive a wedge between Pacer and his white brother, Clint (Steve Forrest), he takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Press Your Luck
programme.desc: Three contestants compete against one another in a game of wits and strategy, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board. The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: People Puzzler
programme.desc: Leah Remini hosts the show, which features three contestants who put their pop culture knowledge to the test to complete crosswords from the pop culture magazine. During a player's turn, one word out of 10 is chosen from the board. The contestant is then shown the first unrevealed letter in the word, and a clue is given, with correct answers scoring points based on the word. The player who wins the most points after three rounds moves forward to the fast puzzle bonus round, where they get the opportunity to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid

The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash - up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Boss Spearman (Robert Duvall) and his cowhands Charley (Kevin Costner) and Mose (Abraham Benrubi) are driving cattle across a large expanse of country. When Mose ventures into a sparse village to buy a few necessities, he is met with violent hostility from Denton Baxter (Michael Gambon), an affluent landowner, and his right-hand man, Poole (James Russo). When Mose doesn't come back, Boss and Charley realize he's in trouble, so they plot to get him back and get revenge on those who captured him.

When some local racists cause Neddy's death by preventing the doctor from coming to her aid, a war between the whites and the tribe erupts. As the war threatens to drive a wedge between Pacer and his white brother, Clint (Steve Forrest), he takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Servant of the People

programme.title: Servant of the People

programme.title: Servant of the People
programme.desc: The president institutes reforms on administrative spending, upsetting government officials; Vasiliy's parents plan a massive renovation in their apartment.

programme.title: Prisoners of War
programme.desc: The negotiations for the release of the Israeli soldiers has ended successfully. Soldiers Nimrod Klien, Uri Zach and Amiel Ben Chorin reunite with their loved ones.

programme.title: Prisoners of War
programme.desc: Nimrode and Uri face an interrogation from psychiatrist Major Haim Cohen; they are forced to relive their 17 years in captivity.

programme.title: Prisoners of War
programme.desc: Unlocking the secrets of Nimrode and Uri's night-time communication; Major Maim Cohen distrusts the former prisoners of war.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes’ guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes’ adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E16 Unfinished Business After surviving a brutal massacre of wealthy settlers, Evan, Emma's estranged husband, comes to Sweetwater looking for shelter. When Evan wants to reconcile their relationship, Sam and the riders are suspicious of his intentions.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Texas Fence-Cutting War When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes’ guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes’ adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he’s called to Mississippi to visit Kaley’s parents. Bubba’s in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E3 Tradition vs. Technology A routine job turns tough when the cowboys struggle to wrangle the herd across a highway, sparking Cody’s idea to use GPS devices so they can easily find cattle in the pasture. Bubba hides a cow in the woods and Booger challenges Cody to prove GPS technology beats traditional methods. Misty and Kaley help Jaclyn find the perfect wedding dress while Bubba fails to fit into his tuxedo pants, prompting Booger and Cody to put him on a weight-loss regimen. Cody writes a song in honor of Booger’s wedding and surprises Misty with a trailer for her new cattle business.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Trinity Is Still My Name
programme.desc: Two brothers promise their dying father they'll become the notorious bandits he always wanted them to be. While the older brother intends to teach his younger brother outlaw skills, the two save a pioneer family and break up an arms ring instead.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E3 The Impostor When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E4 Prisoner of Moon Mesa Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E3 The Impostor When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E4 Prisoner of Moon Mesa Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don?t arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher’s herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn’t ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E5 Down and Dirty With nine cowboys remaining, the competition gets fierce. First, an old-fashioned horse race turns into an all-out brawl. Then, a cowboy is rushed to the hospital after a freak accident. Host Trace Adkins and the judges send another cowboy home.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E7 Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E22 Then There Was One Teaspoon travels to Texas with an old comrade to warn three aging veterans that someone has been murdering the last men who genuinely remember the Alamo. Jimmy and Buck follow from behind as Teaspoon tracks down the killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E5 Gold, Glory and Custer - Prelude Assigned as a scout, Cheyenne travels with Lt. Colonel George A. Custer and his regiment into Sioux territory while they search for gold. However, events lead up to the famous Little Bighorn disaster.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E6 Gold, Glory and Custer - Requiem A disastrous massacre at Little Bighorn wipes out Colonel Custer's regiment and forces Cheyenne into hiding. But when Major Marcus Reno faces charges of cowardice, Cheyenne re-emerges to testify for him.

programme.desc: S4 E6 Gold, Glory and Custer - Requiem A disastrous massacre at Little Bighorn wipes out Colonel Custer's regiment and forces Cheyenne into hiding. But when Major Marcus Reno faces charges of cowardice, Cheyenne re-emerges to testify for him.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law’s company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E7 All for One or One for Himself Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley’s father. However, Bubba’s reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naive woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S4 E6 Broken Down After demonstrating their calf-roping skills, the 8 remaining cowboys are challenged to drive a herd of cattle and an old-fashioned chuck wagon across the rugged Arizona terrain. Host Trace Adkins and his expert judges send another cowboy packing.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E23 Gathering Clouds Part 1 As tensions rise between the North and the South, the Army recruits the Kid to infiltrate a band of Southern rebel guerrillas led by a man known as the Hawk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E7 Riot at Arroyo Seco Cheyenne faces issues in a small town, including a dry well and anxiety from townspeople, which leads to an uprising. As sheriff, he tries to keep the peace, but the formation of a lynch mob forces him to shoot and kill a prominent citizen's son.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E8 Apache Blood Cheyenne returns a young white man named Mickey, who was kidnapped by the Apaches when he was a child. Problems arise when Mickey's family isn't accepting of his Mexican wife. Mickey rebels against his family, and Cheyenne tries to save his marriage.
